property.name: videoUrl
property.description-key: The URL of the video to be played.

property.name: hasJwtRestriction
property.description-key: If enabled the JWT token will sent in an authorization header.

property.name: jwtToken
property.description-key: The JWT token to be sent in the authorization header.

property.name: MkPlayerLicenseKey
property.description-key: Player license key available in the MediaKind Portal.

property.name: autoPlay
property.description-key: If enabled the video will start playing automatically.

event.name: OnPlay
event.description-key: Fires when the video starts playing.

event.name: OnPause
event.description-key: Fires when the video is paused.

event.name: OnReady
event.description-key: Fires when the video is ready to play.

event.name: OnError
event.description-key: Fires when an error occurs during playback.

event.name: OnStallStarted
event.description-key: Fires when player stops receiving more data.

event.name: OnStallEnded
event.description-key: Fires when player starts receiving data again after a stall.
